questions.question: Is the white rectangular signboard with the black kanji "どぜう" present above the entrance of the traditional building?
questions.explanation: Analyzing Image B, the focus is on determining the presence of the specific signboard with Japanese writing. Image B shows a futuristic large robot dominating the scene, disallowing clear visibility of traditional building details including signboards. The head and upper body of the robot obscure the potential position of a building entrance signboard. Therefore, based on Image B alone, the signboard with the kanji 'どぜう' is not observed.

questions.question: Is the vertical white sign with black Japanese text "うちおぎ 仮四宿" mounted on the left side of the building?

The enormous robot conceals much of the background, including buildings and any signs they might have, leading to an absence of visibility for such details. questions.question: Is the tall wooden utility pole with multiple wires and attached streetlights visible on the left side of the image?

questions.question: Is a bicycle parked on the sidewalk near the right edge of the image?

questions.question: Is the traditional building positioned in front of the tall white skyscraper, creating a layered depth effect?
